short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads lecture recordings from KIT Ilias

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension simplifies the process of downloading videos from the Ilias system of Karlsruher Institut f√ºr Technologie.

If you wanted to download recordings manually, you'd have to search for the link to the video file in the page source.
This extension automates that process.
